price: 23. Waxaanu dhab ahaan la dirnay Muuse Aayadahayaga iyo awood cad.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مُوسَىٰ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٍ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walaqad arsalnā mūsā biāyātinā wasul'ṭānin mubīnin
